channel.title: Compiling error
channel.description:
well um this is the compiling error i get [code] javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
so then i more it too src then server and compile and get this [code] Connection.java:9: package server.model.players does not exist import server.model.players.Client; ^ Connection.java:310: cannot find symbol symbol : class Client location: class server.Connection public static boolean isMuted(Client c) { ^ Server.java:7: package org.apache.mina.common does not exist import org.apache.mina.common.IoAcceptor; ^ Server.java:8: package org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio does not exist import org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor; ^ Server.java:9: package org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio does not exist import org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptorConfig; ^ Server.java:11: package server.event does not exist import server.event.EventManager; ^ Server.java:12: package server.model.npcs does not exist import server.model.npcs.NPCHandler; ^ Server.java:13: package server.model.npcs does not exist import server.model.npcs.NPCDrops; ^ Server.java:14: package server.model.players does not exist import server.model.players.PlayerHandler; ^ Server.java:15: package server.model.players does not exist import server.model.players.Player; ^ Server.java:16: package server.model.players does not exist import server.model.players.Client; ^ Server.java:17: package server.model.players does not exist import server.model.players.PlayerSave; ^ Server.java:18: package server.model.minigames does not exist import server.model.minigames.*; ^ Server.java:19: package server.net does not exist import server.net.ConnectionHandler; ^ Server.java:20: package server.net does not exist import server.net.ConnectionThrottleFilter; ^ Server.java:21: package server.util does not exist import server.util.ShutDownHook; ^ Server.java:22: package server.util does not exist import server.util.SimpleTimer; ^ Server.java:23: package server.util.log does not exist import server.util.log.Logger; ^ Server.java:24: package server.world does not exist import server.world.ItemHandler; ^ Server.java:25: package server.world does not exist import server.world.ObjectHandler; ^ Server.java:26: package server.world does not exist import server.world.ObjectManager; ^ Server.java:27: package server.world does not exist import server.world.ShopHandler; ^ Server.java:28: package server.world.map does not exist import server.world.map.VirtualWorld; ^ Server.java:29: package server.world does not exist import server.world.ClanChatHandler; ^ Server.java:30: package server.world does not exist import server.world.WorldMap; ^ Server.java:49: cannot find symbol symbol : class IoAcceptor location: class server.Server private static IoAcceptor acceptor; ^ Server.java:50: cannot find symbol symbol : class ConnectionHandler location: class server.Server private static ConnectionHandler connectionHandler; ^ Server.java:51: cannot find symbol symbol : class ConnectionThrottleFilter location: class server.Server private static ConnectionThrottleFilter throttleFilter; ^ Server.java:52: cannot find symbol symbol : class SimpleTimer location: class server.Server private static SimpleTimer engineTimer, debugTimer; ^ Server.java:58: cannot find symbol symbol : class ItemHandler location: class server.Server public static ItemHandler itemHandler = new ItemHandler(); ^ Server.java:59: cannot find symbol symbol : class PlayerHandler location: class server.Server public static PlayerHandler playerHandler = new PlayerHandler(); ^ Server.java:60: cannot find symbol symbol : class NPCHandler location: class server.Server public static NPCHandler npcHandler = new NPCHandler(); ^ Server.java:61: cannot find symbol symbol : class ShopHandler location: class server.Server public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ Server.java:62: cannot find symbol symbol : class ObjectHandler location: class server.Server public static ObjectHandler objectHandler = new ObjectHandler(); ^ Server.java:63: cannot find symbol symbol : class ObjectManager location: class server.Server public static ObjectManager objectManager = new ObjectManager(); ^ Server.java:64: cannot find symbol symbol : class CastleWars location: class server.Server public static CastleWars castleWars = new CastleWars(); ^ Server.java:65: cannot find symbol symbol : class FightPits location: class server.Server public static FightPits fightPits = new FightPits(); ^ Server.java:66: cannot find symbol symbol : class PestControl location: class server.Server public static PestControl pestControl = new PestControl(); ^ Server.java:67: cannot find symbol symbol : class NPCDrops location: class server.Server public static NPCDrops npcDrops = new NPCDrops(); ^ Server.java:68: cannot find symbol symbol : class ClanChatHandler location: class server.Server public static ClanChatHandler clanChat = new ClanChatHandler(); ^ Server.java:69: cannot find symbol symbol : class FightCaves location: class server.Server public static FightCaves fightCaves = new FightCaves(); ^ Server.java:58: cannot find symbol symbol : class ItemHandler location: class server.Server public static ItemHandler itemHandler = new ItemHandler(); ^ Server.java:59: cannot find symbol symbol : class PlayerHandler location: class server.Server public static PlayerHandler playerHandler = new PlayerHandler(); ^ Server.java:60: cannot find symbol symbol : class NPCHandler location: class server.Server public static NPCHandler npcHandler = new NPCHandler(); ^ Server.java:61: cannot find symbol symbol : class ShopHandler location: class server.Server public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ Server.java:62: cannot find symbol symbol : class ObjectHandler location: class server.Server public static ObjectHandler objectHandler = new ObjectHandler(); ^ Server.java:63: cannot find symbol symbol : class ObjectManager location: class server.Server public static ObjectManager objectManager = new ObjectManager(); ^ Server.java:64: cannot find symbol symbol : class CastleWars location: class server.Server public static CastleWars castleWars = new CastleWars(); ^ Server.java:65: cannot find symbol symbol : class FightPits location: class server.Server public static FightPits fightPits = new FightPits(); ^ Server.java:66: cannot find symbol symbol : class PestControl location: class server.Server public static PestControl pestControl = new PestControl(); ^ Server.java:67: cannot find symbol symbol : class NPCDrops location: class server.Server public static NPCDrops npcDrops = new NPCDrops(); ^ Server.java:68: cannot find symbol symbol : class ClanChatHandler location: class server.Server public static ClanChatHandler clanChat = new ClanChatHandler(); ^ Server.java:69: cannot find symbol symbol : class FightCaves location: class server.Server public static FightCaves fightCaves = new FightCaves(); ^ Server.java:81: cannot find symbol symbol : class SimpleTimer location: class server.Server engineTimer = new SimpleTimer(); ^ Server.java:82: cannot find symbol symbol : class SimpleTimer location: class server.Server debugTimer = new SimpleTimer(); ^ Server.java:96: cannot find symbol symbol : class Logger location: class server.Server System.setOut(new Logger(System.out)); ^ Server.java:97: cannot find symbol symbol : class Logger location: class server.Server System.setErr(new Logger(System.err)); ^ Server.java:115: cannot find symbol symbol : class SocketAcceptor location: class server.Server acceptor = new SocketAcceptor(); ^ Server.java:116: cannot find symbol symbol : class ConnectionHandler location: class server.Server connectionHandler = new ConnectionHandler(); ^ Server.java:118: cannot find symbol symbol : class SocketAcceptorConfig location: class server.Server SocketAcceptorConfig sac = new SocketAcceptorConfig(); ^ Server.java:118: cannot find symbol symbol : class SocketAcceptorConfig location: class server.Server SocketAcceptorConfig sac = new SocketAcceptorConfig(); ^ Server.java:123: cannot find symbol symbol : class ConnectionThrottleFilter location: class server.Server throttleFilter = new ConnectionThrottleFilter(Config.CONNECTION_ DELAY); ^ Server.java:130: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EventManager location: class server.Server EventManager.initialize(); ^ Server.java:166: cannot find symbol symbol : class Player location: class server.Server for(Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { ^ Server.java:166: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PlayerHandler location: class server.Server for(Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { ^ Server.java:169: cannot find symbol symbol : class Client location: class server.Server PlayerSave.saveGame((Client)p); ^ Server.java:169: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PlayerSave location: class server.Server PlayerSave.saveGame((Client)p); ^ Server.java:194: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PlayerHandler location: class server.Server System.out.println("Players online: " + PlayerHandler.pl ayerCount+ ", engine load: "+ debugPercentFormat.format(engineLoad)); ^ 68 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
um can anyone help me is it my compiler for where i place it and how can i fix the problems (got the server like this)
oh yea my compiler [code] @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause [/code]
ty

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

my compiler works just figured it out i just need the errors

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

try this for your compiler @echo off @TITLE Epick-Scape Compiler echo Compiling... Please Wait if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You Havent Downloaded Java :P.... :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Make the “Client” in those errors, “client”, so just lowercase the “C”.

Read full topic
